name.ja: <ruby>援<rt>えん</rt></ruby><ruby>奏<rt>そう</rt></ruby>のコンダーグラー

requirement.en: Shuffle 2 WIND Attribute Psychic Type monsters from your Graveyard into the Deck, except monsters with 1300 ATK.

effect.en: Increase this card's Level by 3 until the end of this turn. Then, you can Set 1 "Nobody Scat Thief" or "Traditional Tax" from your Graveyard to your Spell & Trap Zone. If you do, you can change the battle position of 1 monster on your opponent's field.
